Title: Detention
Plot: In what is said to be one of the best episodes, the gang, after committing various violations at school, gets stuck together for an 8 hour Saturday detention, where Dawson and Pacey turn against each another; and Joey offers a tearful partial explanation for her anger toward Jen.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Monica Keena, Helen Baldwin, Mati Moralejo, Mike Pniewski, Micah Leamer, Barry Bell, Lyndabeth Bureau, Adrienne Harvey, John Copeman, Alan Christy
